item.title: Here's how much a $75,000 home equity loan costs monthly with interest rates falling again
item.description: Costs associated with home equity loans are falling. Here's how much a $75,000 home equity loan costs monthly now.

item.title: Study of world's oldest person reveals what helped her live to 117
item.description: Maria Branyas Morera once posted on social media about her love for yogurt, saying it "gives life," and hers was a long one.

item.title: Amazon to pay $2.5 billion to settle claims it misled Prime members
item.description: As part of the settlement, Amazon will pay $1.5 billion in refunds to customers, who could receive $51 each from the payout.
